author: sroychow
body:
#### PR description:
A follow up to  #32805 fixing the logic of counter reset after 10 lumis. @makortel I have tried to implement what you had [suggested](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/32805#issuecomment-773473223) in the earlier PR. Please have a look. 

#### PR validation:
Test with : runTheMatrix.py -t 4 -l 4.53

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
NA
title: TkDQM: fix reset counter logic in SiPixelDigiSource
